home.title: Know You Better
home.subtitle: Adolescent Psychological Counseling Platform
home.welcome: Welcome to a supportive space for teen mental health
home.description: Discover your inner self through AI-powered psychological analysis, connect with professional counselors, and join a caring community.
home.uploadDescription: Upload your House-Tree-Person drawing for AI psychological analysis
home.comprehensiveSupportDesc: Our platform combines AI technology with human expertise to provide personalized, accessible mental health care for adolescents.
home.counselingDescription: Connect with professional counselors through secure video calls or instant messaging for personalized support.
home.knowledgeDescription: Access a comprehensive library of articles, videos, and interactive content about teen mental health topics.
home.communityDescription: Join a supportive community where you can share experiences and connect with peers in a safe, moderated environment.
home.privacyDescription: Your privacy is our top priority. All data is encrypted and protected with industry-leading security measures.
home.expertDescription: All content and AI models are developed and reviewed by licensed mental health professionals and researchers.
home.quickAccessDesc: Get started immediately with these popular features
home.uploadDrawingDesc: Upload your House-Tree-Person drawing and get instant AI psychological insights.
home.browseKnowledgeDesc: Explore our comprehensive library of mental health resources and educational content.
home.joinCommunityDesc: Connect with peers and share your journey in our safe, supportive community space.
home.joinThousands: Join thousands of teens who have found support, understanding, and growth through our platform.

analysis.title: Drawing Analysis
analysis.uploadDescription: Upload a clear image of your House-Tree-Person drawing for AI psychological analysis
analysis.dragDrop: Drag and drop your image here, or click to select
